sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the MRSA Screening and Reporting Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the MRSA Screening and Reporting Act.

sections.heading: MRSA control program.  In order to improve the prevention of hospital-associated bloodstream infections due to methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ("MRSA"), every hospital shall establish an MRSA control program that requires:

sections.heading: Reporting by Department of Public Health.
sections.text: Reporting by Department of Public Health.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
